abstract: A sale of K2, which has nearly $10 billion in assets under management, would be among the most notable in the world of fund of funds.
snippet: A sale of K2, which has nearly $10 billion in assets under management, would be among the most notable in the world of fund of funds.
lead_paragraph: 2:08 p.m. | Updated K2 Advisors, one of the big players in the fund-of-hedge-funds industry with nearly $10 billion in assets, has begun early talks with potential suitors like Carlyle Group about a potential sale, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: K2 Advisors Begins Talks for Potential Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Azam Ahmed
